page.title: 10Fishing in Our Area
page.content: These are the best places to fish in our area.The Gymes is the best pond for perch,roach,rudd and minnow. Ravensfleet Drain is the most popular place for catching pike and Jack pike.In the River Trent you can catch eel,chub,carp,and occasionally barbel,bleak,dart,gudgeon and dace. Clark's Pond has the best tench.The fishing season starts on June 21st and finishes on March 16th.The best bait for the Gymes is maggot but for Ravensfleet Drain worms are preferable.In Clark's Pond we always use maggot.The most suitable rod to use in the River Trent is a ledger rod whereas in Ravensfleet Drain it is the pike rod.In the Gymes and Clark's Pond a carbon rod is recommended.All the bait is available from the Tackle Shop on Tooley Street.You can buy all sorts of rods at this shop.
